title: Water Bottle Squat Thrusters
description: Water Bottle Squat Thrusters is a gym work out exercise that targets glutes & hip flexors and quadriceps and shoulders and also involves hamstrings and triceps
related_exercises: Dual / Two Arm Dumbbell Front Shoulder Raises
Lunging / Lunge with Bicep Hammer Curls
Dumbbell Bent Over Lateral Rear Delt Raises / Flyes
